Element.description: a physical piece of information used or produced in a software development process or system deployment/operation
models the logical communication relations between nodes as Connection
models the logical communication relations between nodes as Box
a physical computational resource upon which artifacts may be deployed for execution
a behavior element that groups infrastructural behavior that can be performed by a node
where the functionality offered by a node can be accessed by other nodes and application components
provided by one or more nodes as an externally visible unit of functionality through well-defined interfaces
a physical communication medium between two or more devices as Connection
a physical communication medium between two or more devices as Box
a computational resource upon which artifacts may be deployed for execution
a specialization of a node that is used to model the software environment in which artifacts run
represents an aggregate of two or more nodes that work together to perform collective technology behavior
is a technology behavior element that denotes a state change
represents a unit of collective technology behavior performed by (a collaboration of) two or more nodes
represents a sequence of technology behaviors that achieves a specific outcome
